title: Clip on Zoom / Macro Lenses ...... are they worth it ?
content:
Loving my Pixel 3 camera for documentary video but way too often, I'm losing sharpness with even the slightest of zoom when trying to get close ups of flowers. If I move the camera in "macro style" then I get the "move back to focus" screen warning and if I try to keep minimum distance and zoom in then I lose edge sharpness in the resulting video.

Would a clip on macro or zoom lens deliver sharp results if I wanted close ups ?
